explains: n. [生物][化学][物] 再生，重生；重建

sentences.en: Vitamin B assists in red-blood-cell regeneration.
sentences.cn: 维生素B有助于红细胞的再生。

sentences.en: They found that salamander regeneration begins when a clump of cells called blastema forms at the tip of a lost limb.
sentences.cn: 他们发现，蝾螈再生是从一团被称为芽基的细胞在断肢顶端形成的时候开始的。

sentences.en: The thin-skin muskmelon inbred lines were used to study the effects of explants, seedling age, and hormones on plant in vitro regeneration.
sentences.cn: 以甜瓜薄皮自交系为材料，研究了外植体、苗龄、激素等因素对甜瓜离体再生的影响。
